member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.GitUtil.CompareCommits(NGit.Repository,NGit.Revwalk.RevCommit,NGit.Revwalk.RevCommit)
member.summary: Compares two commits and returns a list of files that have changed

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.GitUtil.GetCommitChanges(NGit.Repository,NGit.Revwalk.RevCommit)
member.summary: Returns a list of files that have changed in a commit

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.MyersDiff.Call
member.summary: Executes the Diff command with all the options and parameters collected by the setter methods (e.g. SetCached(bool) of this class. Each instance of this class should only be used for one invocation of the command. Don't call this method twice on an instance.
member.returns: a DiffEntry for each path which is different

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.MyersDiff.SetCached(System.Boolean)
member.param: whether to view the changes you staged for the next commit

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.MyersDiff.SetPathFilter(NGit.Treewalk.Filter.TreeFilter)
member.param: parameter, used to limit the diff to the named path

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.MyersDiff.SetShowNameAndStatusOnly(System.Boolean)
member.param: whether to return only names and status of changed files

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.MyersDiff.SetOutputStream(Sharpen.OutputStream)
member.param: the stream to write line data

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.MyersDiff.SetContextLines(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set number of context lines instead of the usual three.
member.remarks: Set number of context lines instead of the usual three.

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.MyersDiff.SetSourcePrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Set the given source prefix instead of "a/".
member.remarks: Set the given source prefix instead of "a/".

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.MyersDiff.SetDestinationPrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Set the given destination prefix instead of "b/".
member.remarks: Set the given destination prefix instead of "b/".

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.VersionControl.Git.MyersDiff.SetProgressMonitor(NGit.ProgressMonitor)
member.summary: The progress monitor associated with the diff operation.
member.remarks: The progress monitor associated with the diff operation. By default, this is set to NullProgressMonitor
